abstract: There are a couple of whopping great features Windows Live, available to everyone (even non-Windows people), that are totally underpublicized.
snippet: There are a couple of whopping great features Windows Live, available to everyone (even non-Windows people), that are totally underpublicized.
lead_paragraph: Every time Microsoft pitches me on some Windows Live product, I groan. What the heck is Windows Live? I mean, what is it this week?

headline.main: A Closer Look at Windows Live
headline.kicker: From the Desk of David Pogue
